metadata.feature_description: Group similar activities together in the stream

steps.expected: Activity Feed page loads with Activity Stream module
steps.actual: Activity Feed page loaded successfully showing Activity Stream module with multiple posts

steps.action: Navigate to Module Settings for Activity Stream module (375)
steps.expected: Module settings page opens with Activity Stream tab
steps.actual: Module settings page loaded with tabs: Module Settings, Permissions, Page Settings, Activity Stream

steps.action: Click on Activity Stream tab and locate Enable Grouping of Posts setting
steps.expected: Enable Grouping of Posts checkbox is visible and accessible
steps.actual: Enable Grouping of Posts checkbox is visible and currently checked (enabled)

steps.action: Click Help icon for Enable Grouping of Posts setting
steps.expected: Help tooltip displays description of the grouping feature
steps.actual: Help tooltip displayed: 'When checked, activity stream posts of similar type will be grouped together as a single post.'

observations: The Enable Grouping of Posts setting is located in Module Settings -> Activity Stream tab (not Activity Stream > Display Options as indicated in feature documentation)
Setting is currently enabled (checked) on the test instance
Grouping behavior groups similar activity types together as a single post when enabled
No visible grouped entries were observed in the current Activity Feed, likely because activities are from the same user rather than multiple users performing similar actions
The GroupedJournalControl.ascx component handles displaying grouped entries with a 'Load More' option to expand grouped items
